titles.title: Protecting Global Fisheries Act of 2025
Protecting Global Fisheries Act of 2025

A bill to support the execution of bilateral agreements concerning illicit transnational maritime activity and to authorize the President to impose sanctions with respect to illegal, unreported, or unregulated fishing and the sale, supply, purchase, or transfer of endangered species, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
